name: Gallop Racer 2000
overview: A stable of 1500 horse make up the mighty steed database in Gallop Racer 2000. The gameplay's simple enough where you get on the saddle and race your equine to the winning post while thundering competitors strive for the same goals. This version allow players to create their own "dream horse". Other new feature will include new horses being allowed to inherit the abilities of their parents. This game is the last one in the Gallop Racer series for PSone. These are the game modes: - Season mode - Practice mode - Vs Mode - Dream Cup mode
